meanings.definition: The process of removing toxic substances from the body.
meanings.sent1: Detoxification is important for staying healthy.
meanings.sent2: After a weekend of unhealthy eating, I decided to do a detoxification cleanse.
meanings.sent3: The detoxification of my room involved throwing out all the old junk.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was like a detoxification for the toxic environment.
meanings.sent5: The detoxification of the river was evident as the water became clearer and cleaner.

meanings.definition: The act of cleansing or purifying something by removing impurities.
meanings.sent1: Detoxification of the skin can help improve its appearance.
meanings.sent2: The detoxification of the air in the room was done by using an air purifier.
meanings.sent3: The detoxification of the city streets involved a massive cleanup effort.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a detoxification for the negativity in the office.
meanings.sent5: The detoxification of the mind through meditation can bring clarity and peace.
